title: GP returns but still disabled?
body: If GP is meant to have returned and is not dead, why is he still disabled?

replies.body:
It's called strategy :P
Get you hyped 4 nothing, wp riot xD
he's stuck in a coma due to the trauma. be patient and bring him orange juice when you visit, maybe it will help him remember something and come back to us
Hey it was never confirmed that mysterious figure was GP who knows?
